Html:
I downloaded the site and I have corrected some connection string issues but I am having a problem that I cannot figure out. 

Here is the message I get (Please Help):

Configuration Error

Description: An error occurred during the processing of a configuration file required to service this request. Please review the specific error details below and modify your configuration file appropriately.

Parser Error Message: The connection name 'ClubSiteDB' was not found in the applications configuration or the connection string is empty.

Source Error: 

Line 238:			<providers>
Line 239:				<remove name="AspNetSqlRoleProvider"/>
Line 240: <add connectionStringName="ClubSiteDB" applicationName="/" name="AspNetSqlRoleProvider" type="System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider, 
System.Web, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, 
PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a"/>Line 241:			</providers>
Line 242:		</roleManager>

Source File: C:\Documents and Settings\Ciaran Ennis\My Documents\Visual Studio 2008\WebSites\Express (VB)\web.config    Line: 240
